    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Terrifying Resistance](/Feats.aspx?ID=6509) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=615" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=695" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 234 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40)

</column>

---

The spells of those you have [Demoralized](/Actions.aspx?ID=2395) are less effective on you. If you succeed in Demoralizing a creature, for the next 24 hours you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against that creature's spells.
